MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 10.44am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still on site investigating the fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:25am on Wednesday, 16 December 2020.
